main_task: Gather valid information about the Technical Specifications and Technical Reports for an Evolved Packet System (EPS) based 3GPP system.

task_1.content: Fetch the latest Technical Specifications (TS) related to the Evolved Packet System (EPS) from the 3GPP FTP server.
task_1.agent_role_description: The 3GPP Standards Specialist is responsible for retrieving the most recent Technical Specifications related to the Evolved Packet System from the 3GPP FTP server, ensuring the documents are relevant and up-to-date.
local_constraints: Ensure that the fetched Technical Specifications are the latest and specifically related to EPS.

task_2.content: Fetch the latest Technical Reports (TR) related to the Evolved Packet System (EPS) from the 3GPP FTP server.
task_2.agent_role_description: The 3GPP Standards Specialist is responsible for retrieving the most recent Technical Reports related to the Evolved Packet System from the 3GPP FTP server, ensuring the documents are relevant and up-to-date.
local_constraints: Ensure that the fetched Technical Reports are the latest and specifically related to EPS.

task_3.content: Based on the Technical Specifications fetched in task_1, summarize the key information and insights.
task_3.agent_role_description: The Technical Documentation Specialist will analyze the Technical Specifications obtained from task_1 and summarize the key points, focusing on the main technical aspects of the EPS.
local_constraints: The summary must be concise and highlight the most relevant technical details from the specifications.

task_4.content: Based on the Technical Reports fetched in task_2, summarize the key information and insights.
task_4.agent_role_description: The Technical Documentation Specialist will analyze the Technical Reports obtained from task_2 and summarize the key points, focusing on the main findings and recommendations related to the EPS.
local_constraints: The summary must be concise and highlight the most relevant findings from the reports.

task_5.content: Based on the summaries from task_3 and task_4, compare and analyze the insights to highlight discrepancies or unique findings between the specifications and reports.
task_5.agent_role_description: The Market Researcher will compare the insights from the Technical Specifications and Technical Reports, identifying any discrepancies or unique findings that may impact the understanding of the EPS.
local_constraints: The analysis must be thorough and should clearly outline any differences or unique aspects identified between the two documents.
